summary:
25 Years of strong experience across IT & Automobile Manufacturing industry
A Strategic and forward thinking, versatile IT Executive with Telecom & Manufacturing (Automobile) background and strong  expertise in IT Project and people management, Service Delivery, Managed Service Operations, Contract Management & Customer engagement for Tier 1 Telecom Service Providers in Europe.. Currently working as Product Owner & Service Delivery Manager in a Customer facing role in Netherlands. Excellent ability to lead cross functional, geographically dispersed scrum teams to collaboratively deliver innovative, high quality solutions. Strong in stakeholder management and very good communicator on business critical issues in business language. Establishes & promotes successful partnerships across the organization.

With 15 years of experience in the IT industry, I have a proven track record of successful project deliveries. Managing IT Operations within ITIL & eTOM framework, leading large teams spread across multiple locations, defining and achieving the Business and IT KPI’s, driving the tactical board reviews and Contractual SLA mertics, collaborating with third party suppliers, all these have been my key contributions so far. I have played a key role in creating and managing new opportunities, RPF’s and growing the account within Netherlands. 

Key Skills: 
•	IT Service Delivery and Project Management
•	Scrum and Agile methodoligies
•	End to end product delivery lifecycle – design, development, testing and deployment
•	Domain expertise in Telecom OSS and BSS 
•	IT Operations and Service Management within ITIL framework
•	Hands-on expertise elaborating, documenting, and advocating end-to-end processes
•	Stakeholder Engagement – conducting tactical review board meetings, SLA / KPI metric reporting
•	Customer Relationship Management
•	Pre Sales & Account Mining – exploring new opportunities for revenue generation
•	Building & leading high performance teams – DevOps transformation, IT Rationalzation
•	Contract Management – define & review scope of SOW’s for thir party suppliers and their performance 
•	Good understanding of Supply Chain Management
